thread.title: Nicole Kidman snubbed: Hollywood star’s pain over missing daughter Isabella’s wedding
thread.title_full: Nicole Kidman snubbed: Hollywood star’s pain over missing daughter Isabella’s wedding | DailyTelegraph

author: OPINION — ANNETTE SHARP
title: Nicole Kidman snubbed: Hollywood star’s pain over missing daughter Isabella’s wedding
text:
IT was a pained and tired-looking Nicole Kidman who was photographed in London yesterday — a day after it emerged she not only not invited to her daughter Isabella Cruise’s wedding last month but also wasn’t informed the wedding was taking place.
It’s the kind of news that would break any mother’s heart.
Kidman and Isabella have had an arm’s length relationship for the past 14 years since Kidman’s divorce from Isabella’s father Tom Cruise in 2001 — a separation that must have been harrowing for the actor who, though granted joint custody of Isabella and her younger brother Connor — was effectively shut out of their lives as the organisation took over and Kidman, a Catholic, was branded a “suppressive”.
Isabella Cruise with brother Connor. Picture: Instagram Raised by Cruise and his staff of Scientologists, Isabella, 22, a hair and make-up artist at Vidal Sassoon in London, is still a member of the controversial flock.
Her new husband, who she has dated for under a year, British IT consultant Max Parker, reportedly is not, although he counts Scientologists among his closest friends.
Kidman has always maintained she will be there for her two adult children when they choose to return to her. If Parker is indeed unaffiliated with the organisation, he may prove Kidman’s best hope yet of bringing her daughter back to her.
